data.actual_result: The error message stops on the first line where you can only see "We need"
data.expected_result: The error message with the persons username should be moved onto a new line
data.short_description: [Small Screen Specific] The red error message when entering a long username is cropped from going downwards so you can't see the whole message
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the 3 grey people heads - Tap friends - Open the add friend screen - Enter a long username eg "WWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW"  - Tap send
